2,500 gallons of water are needed to produce 1 pound of beef.

This is a short clip from the section about water in the upcoming feature length environmental documentary Cowspiracy: the sustainability secret.

Un des nombreux et éloquents extraits du documentaire Cowspiracy qui montrent que l’élevage est l’industrie la plus polluante et la plus énergivore.

Ici, c’est la consommation d’eau qui est mise en avant.

agriculture is responsible for 80 90 of us water


Agriculture is responsible for 80-90% of US water consumption.

“USDA ERS – Irrigation & Water Use.” United States Department of Agriculture Economic Research Service. 2013.
